data.marketing-contacts-highlight-introductio: No more manual contacts updates. All you need is Cards.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-problem-tex: When you start using Cards, your contacts resurrect as live cards. You can make and receive cards for free.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-problem-upd: Updated in real time – no more manual edits
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-problem-pri: Private – share the right card with the right person
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-features-li: Phone numbers, e-mail address–all contact information stays updated with live cards.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-features-mu: We recognize that you may have more than one identity: one for work, one for hobby, one for something else.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-features-mo: Add or remove features with a simple swipe. Connect other contacts services.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-features-de: Apps for all popular platforms and progressive web-app for your browser.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-intelligent: The more you use Cards – the smarter it becomes. Search and scroll less – the card is already waiting. Know when is the right time to call someone.
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-gidital-tex: Replace printed business cards with Cards. Go paperless and save money!
data.marketing-contacts-highlight-digital-tex: Never run out of live cards to give
